commits.message_subject: fix: trigger container auto-fold in real-time when last article removed (#294)
commits.author: Gilad Barnea

commits.message_subject: feat: add weekly automated cleanup for stale branches and PRs (#293)
commits.author: Gilad Barnea

commits.message_subject: fix: use npm ci instead of npm install to prevent package-lock.json churn (#292)
commits.author: Gilad Barnea

commits.message_subject: docs: document recursive auto-collapse behavior in ARCHITECTURE.md (#291)
commits.author: Gilad Barnea

commits.message_subject: Fold containers by default if children are removed (#290)
commits.author: Gilad Barnea

commits.message_body:
Refactors the Feed architecture to improved CalendarDay -> NewsletterDay hierarchy.
- Introduces FoldableContainer for collapsing newsletters and sections.
- Persists fold state to client localStorage via new useLocalStorage hook.
- Adds specific visual states for 'all removed' content.
- Updates Architecture documentation to reflect new component structure.
commits.author: Gilad Barnea

commits.message_body: Add three navigation buttons below main title
commits.author: Gilad Barnea
